attributes.title: Destroyed my phone.
attributes.review: I wanted to leave a good review, I really did. However, apart from taking hours to download, this app completely crashed my phone. The screen went black and wouldn’t turn back on no matter what I did. Had to get a new one. 💔

attributes.title: MY IQ WAS HURT
attributes.review:
I took an IQ test, downloaded this app, went on it regularly (the only change I made), retook the IQ test and my IQ is now 50!!! I’m not even leaving this review, my doctor is because this app made me so unintelligent and unable to have coherent thoughts that I can’t even form sentences!! 
I’m boycotting the color orange!! 
#NotMyCheeto

attributes.title: traumatized!!
attributes.review: i downloaded the app and immediately was sent death threats to burn my cat in my oven or else my death would be coming soon. obviously, since i don’t own a cat (or the will to live), i ignored the threat. some tall men showed up to my house the next day, with a cat, and forced the cat to rip out my hair strand by strand (i’m sure the cat enjoyed it, don’t worry). then, when i thought they were done, they threw my pet rock into the ceiling fan, dooming him to a life of tiny little pebbles. i’m traumatized, and definitely in need of therapy.

attributes.title: TONS OF MALWARE - DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and IMMEDIATELY had to restart my phone because i couldn’t TAP ANYTHING.  My phone SHUT DOWN. The email list I signed up for in the app led me to nothing but ads and viruses. Please be smart and rate it one star so we can keep others from going through what i had to.

attributes.title: Absolutely Horrible
attributes.review: The app took forever to download and the overall app is very confusing and difficult to use. There are so many glitches and it freezes all the time, take it down.

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: My phone kept on calling me a snowflake would often turn orange and just not do it’s job properly! This app needs to deleted because it was constantly yelling insults that made no sense and is probably sharing my information with Russia! Insane 🤯

attributes.title: such a horrible app 🧚🏻
attributes.review: i was gonna get the app to see what the white racists liked, and i’m very disappointed. the app took 5 days to download, and when it did it glitched and made my dog cry. and since it made my dog cry and made my dog sad, i give it a one star rating. needs to be taken down NOW!!! FOOLISH APP 🧚🏻😡🤧🤮🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: Black lives matter✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever seen on the App Store. It took weeks to download and even sent a virus to my phone! And I even found out that they are tracking you from this app! This is totally unacceptable I cannot believe I wanted to download this! smh. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!

attributes.title: Systematic Troubles
attributes.review: I kept having troubles with this app.. nd my phone started lagging so something may he wrong with the application system. I don’t really like the app because I can go to the news app supplies by Apple to get news since this one doesn’t work.

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: Turned off my phone on and off for like a week! It’s like a virus or a bug or something on the app. The app is glitchy by itself and takes you back to your home screen. Do not recommend
